attributes.action: Change the education system to one which is up to date.
attributes.background: We need to change the 'one model fits all' and become more flexible. The current education system was designed to prepare students to work in factories. Considering the importance of teachers they really ought to be paid the same amount as doctors as they help develop the minds of students.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. In particular we're not sure what you mean by "change the education system to one which is up to date" or what you mean by "more flexible".

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
